data.text: Mehunuu Awurade sɛ ɔgyina afɔrebukyia no ho, na ɔkaa sɛ,
Mpo sɛ wɔtu fam kɔ awumena mu a
Mpo sɛ wɔkɔtetɛ bepɔ Karmel atifi a,
Mpo, sɛ wɔn atamfoɔ de wɔn kɔ nnommumfa mu a,
Ɔno na ɔsi nʼahemfie a ɛkrɔn wɔ ɔsoro
Nnebɔneyɛfoɔ a wɔwɔ me nkurɔfoɔ mu nyinaa
“Nna no reba,” sɛdeɛ Awurade seɛ nie,
Mede me nkurɔfoɔ Israel nnommumfoɔ bɛsane aba.
Mede Israelfoɔ bɛdua wɔn ankasa asase so
